# `WhatsAppColumn` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| columnName | `string` | Yes | The name of the whatsApp column. |
| type | `string` | Yes | Indicates the type of the whatsApp column. For example, 'work' or 'personal'. |
